official-title.#text:
To provide greater transparency, accountability, and safety authority to the National Highway
			 Traffic Safety Administration, and for other purposes.

header.#text: First, second, and third year fees

text.#text: The fee assessed under this section for the first 3 years shall be as follows:
$3 for each motor vehicle certified during the first year in which such fees are assessed.
$6 for each motor vehicle certified during the second year in which such fees are assessed.
$9 for each motor vehicle certified during the third year in which such fees are assessed.
